product_name: Katadyn Combi Plus Faucet Mount Adaptor
long_description: Connect the Katadyn Combi Plus Faucet Mount adapter to the Combi filter (sold separately) to filter water directly from the tap in your house, cabin or RV. Adapter attaches to a kitchen faucet and runs water through the Combi filter and out a small spigot so you can fill drinking glasses and water bottles with clean water.
